sentence.Network_en: A bloated carcass of a dog lay lolled on bladderwrack.
sentence.Network_cn: 一具胀得鼓鼓的狗尸耷拉着四肢趴在狸藻上.

sentence.Network_en: An air - filled sac found in large numbers in the thalli of certain seaweeds ( e . g . bladderwrack ).
sentence.Network_cn: 气囊2在一些海草的 植物体 中大量的发现的充满空气的囊. 例如墨角藻.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 丰富姜汁 (Ginger Essence)、黑角藻 (Bladderwrack)、常春藤 (Ivy)、金缕梅 (Witch Hazel)、杜松 (Juniper) 功效：-排走体内之多余水 …

means.word_mean: 1. similar to and found with black rockweed
2. common black rockweed used in preparing kelp and as manure
